project-challenges: Working with NodeJS and ExpressJS 4 was difficult because I was not familiar with these technologies. In addition, writing the code using AngularJS was full of surprises because I had to make a directive for the Web Speech API. The final challenge was writing the code to post notes using the Evernote SDK and Node and attach it to Angular code.
project-future-plans: I would like to make everything voice activated. Also, I would like to add APIs for Twitter and Facebook.
project-inspiration: I've learnt that making things easier for people is a skill. I wanted a way to make it easy for people to import their voice notes into Evernote without having to upload a large file. Therefore, I thought about giving people the opportunity to simply speak to their computers and change the audio file into text through the browser. After that, they could push a button and their note would be sent directly to their Evernote account.
project-lessons-learned: I have a lot to learn still about AngularJS, NodeJS and working with APIs. I need to learn more Javascript. However, it was fun.
project-accomplishments: I am proud that it is done and it works.
project-subtitle: Convert notes into text and save to your Evernote account
